product_name: Big Agnes Air Core SL Sleeping Pad
long_description: The superlight Big Agnes Air Core SL sleeping pad is a half inch thicker and several ounces lighter than the standard Air Core pad, keeping your pack light and offering great comfort for sound sleep. 3.75 in. thick pad is waterproof and lightweight, and packs down to the size of a Nalgene water bottle. I-Beam construction eliminates welded seams to reduce cold spots and ensure quick inflation and deflation. Internal heat-reflective polyurethane coating helps limit radiant heat loss. Lightweight nylon ripstop fabric on the top and bottom stands up to regular use in the outdoors. R-Value of 1; comfort range to 35degF. The Big Agnes Air Core SL sleeping pad includes a stuff sack and repair kit.
short_description: The superlight Big Agnes Air Core SL sleeping pad is a half inch thicker and several ounces lighter than the standard Air Core pad, keeping your pack light and offering great comfort for sound sleep.
